titleStmt.title: The speech of Denzell Holles, Esquire delivered at the Lords Barr, Wednesday, the 15th of Iune vpon the impeachment of the Earles of North-hampton, Devon-shire, Monmouth, and Dover, and of the Lords Rich, Andever, Grey of Ruthen, Coventry and Capell, for their contempt in departing from the Parliament, and not returning upon summons.
titleStmt.author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
